title: Walter Wolf Goes to the Dentist
description: Walter Wolf is like any other four year old. He hates going to the dentist! Except he’s never actually gone before. But he’s heard how scary it is, full of drills aiming for his canines.Imagine his surprise when his Mommy lets him skip the dentist appointment. But there’s a catch--to protect his teeth, he can’t have any candy! Walter discovers there are far worse things than going to the dentist after all.Walter Wolf Goes to the Dentist is a light and funny tale that will charm kids aged 3-7 while teaching them there’s nothing to fear about going to the dentist.
author: Leela Hope
